text: Roberto Draghetti (24 August 1960 - 24 July 2020) was an Italian actor. He was born in Rome. He was known for being the official dubber of actors Jamie Foxx, Terry Crews and Idris Elba. He dubbed the voice of Maurice in the Madagascar franchise and Eddy in Ed, Edd n Eddy. He died of a sudden heart attack on 24 July 2020, aged 59. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1960 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Italian movie actors Category:Italian television actors Category:Italian stage actors Category:Italian voice actors Category:Actors from Rome
title: Roberto Draghetti
